response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's a high-quality item that truly stands out in its category. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is beneficial for both of us. I'm proposing to sell the product to you for $95. This price not only reflects the worth of the product but also allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I trust that you will find the product to be well worth the investment. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 95}
